TopicTitle: No subscription emails since server migration?

Articles.Content:
Well, as title.

Before server migration, I got emails. Afterwards, I get none. All thread subscriptions are still set the same, my email hasn't changed, they're not going to Spam, I just don't get them any more. Pls halp?
I've received some other reports of this issue privately, we're looking into the issue.
Same here until yesterday, when I started getting 50+ emails at a time with old forum notifications, two or three times over.
I have had the same issue, and have yet to recieve a few e-mails from the forum; but I did recieve one e-mail (thread subscription), several hours after the actual reply to the thread.

Haha, obviously I'm not getting emails about replies to this thread, so sorry for not replying!

I'm glad to see I'm not alone in this and that the issue is being investigated. For the moment, I just go to http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/subscription.php?folderid=0 and see what's new.

What's weird is that I am getting emails on my laptop, but not my computer or phone. I have a Gmail account - my phone isn't getting notifications, but with literally the same tab open (Gmail inbox) on my computer and laptop, the former gets nothing while the latter still gets them. It's bizzare.

This should be resolved now, please report if you are still having issues.

OWK, that sounds like a gmail issue to me.
Still not getting subscription update emails here. Also, the forum seems to be logging me out alot.

Try checking the box to stay logged on, I have to do that as well.

Can't help with the emails though, sorry.
Where is the box? The only one I see says "remember me." Might not be getting the right login page tho.
Quick update: I'm getting emails as usual, through both my computer and phone as well as my laptop. Problem solved

I have not had one forum email since the server change. I've checked my ISP email spam filter and my PC one to be really sure I'm not filtering out emails from the forum and there is no problem there. I've checked my settings on the site and they look good. Any ideas?
